languages.text: "Я понимаю, элантах. Ты простил{mf||а} меня, напомнил{mf||а}, по какому Пути я иду. Уже за это я безмерно тебе благодарна".
"I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю, элантах. Ты простил{mf||а} меня, напомнил{mf||а}, по какому Пути я иду. Уже за это я безмерно тебе благодарна".

traits.locale_text: "I understand, elantach. You forgave me, and reminded me of the Path I walk. For this alone, I'm endlessly grateful to you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand, elantach. You forgave me, and reminded me of the Path I walk. For this alone, I'm endlessly grateful to you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我完全理解，外界人。你的宽恕让我回想起来我本该遵循的道途。光是这一点，我就对你感激不尽了。”
languages.original_text: "I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."

traits.locale_text: “我完全理解，外界人。你的宽恕让我回想起来我本该遵循的道途。光是这一点，我就对你感激不尽了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Lo comprendo, elantach. Me has perdonado y me has recordado la senda que camino. Solo por eso ya te estaré eternamente agradecida».
languages.original_text: "I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."

traits.locale_text: «Lo comprendo, elantach. Me has perdonado y me has recordado la senda que camino. Solo por eso ya te estaré eternamente agradecida».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je comprends, elantach. Vous m'avez pardonné et m'avez rappelé la Voie que j'arpente. Rien que pour cela, je vous suis éternellement redevable. »
languages.original_text: "I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends, elantach. Vous m'avez pardonné et m'avez rappelé la Voie que j'arpente. Rien que pour cela, je vous suis éternellement redevable. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verstehe, Elantach. Ihr habt mir vergeben und mich an den Pfad erinnert, den ich beschreite. Allein dafür bin ich Euch ewig dankbar."
languages.original_text: "I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe, Elantach. Ihr habt mir vergeben und mich an den Pfad erinnert, den ich beschreite. Allein dafür bin ich Euch ewig dankbar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「理解したよ、エランタ。我を許し、我の歩む道を思い出させてくれた。それだけで、お前には限りなく感謝している」
languages.original_text: "I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."

traits.locale_text: 「理解したよ、エランタ。我を許し、我の歩む道を思い出させてくれた。それだけで、お前には限りなく感謝している」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Anlıyorum elantach. Beni bağışladın ve yürüdüğüm Yolu bana hatırlattın. Sadece bunlar için bile sana ebediyen minnettar kalacağım."
languages.original_text: "I understand, elantach. You have forgiven me and reminded me of the Path I walk. For that alone, I am endlessly grateful to you."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum elantach. Beni bağışladın ve yürüdüğüm Yolu bana hatırlattın. Sadece bunlar için bile sana ebediyen minnettar kalacağım."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
